mapper.insert: insert into tbl_recipe_ingredient (post_number, ingredient_number, recipe_ingredient_name, recipe_ingredient_quantity) values(#{postNumber} ,#{ingredientNumber}, #{recipeIngredientName}, #{recipeIngredientQuantity})
mapper.select: select ti.ingredient_name ,ri.recipe_ingredient_quantity from tbl_ingredient ti join tbl_recipe_ingredient ri on ti.ingredient_number = ri.ingredient_number and ri.post_number = #{postNumber}

select ti.ingredient_number ,ingredient_name , ingredient_smallest_unit , ingredient_price, tii.ingredient_image_system_name from tbl_ingredient ti join tbl_recipe_ingredient tri on ti.ingredient_number = tri.ingredient_number left join tbl_ingredient_image tii on tii.ingredient_number = ti.ingredient_number where tri.post_number = #{postNumber}
